_xResult.title: Pretty Little Hippie Linen Trousers
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen pants with drop crotch
_xResult.longdesc:
Where did the good times go? Much awry as usual, but much less than the qualms we face today. A simpler time, with simpler measures and simpler means. Transport yourself with peace and love in these hand-crafted, custom made linen pants. Perfect for summer festivals, markets, yoga or just hanging around the house, these pants were made with luxury craftsmanship.

 

Did you know? Linen naturally repels dirt! So you have to wash it less often. The planet will thank you! If you've never experienced having pants made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
